text: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ فِى شِيَعِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sesungguhnya Kami telah mengutus (beberapa rasul) sebelum kamu kepada umat-umat yang terdahulu.
